h4.p: [03] ``ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahatha; ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāya. katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ? lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ pajahatha; ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``ekadhammaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahatha; ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo ^a^T0.0230^ea^ anāgāmitāya. katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ? dosaṃ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṃ pajahatha; ahaṃ vo ^a^P0.0002^ea^ pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..

[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi ^a^T0.0232^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ ^a^P0.0004^ea^ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0198^ea^ sabbaṃ sabbato ñatvā, sabbatthesu na rajjati.
[22] sa ve sabbapariññā {sabbaṃ pariññā (syā0 pī0)} so, sabbadukkhamupaccagā''ti {sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagāti (syā0), sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagāti (pī0 aṭṭha0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[03] ``mānaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya ^a^V0.0005^ea^. mānañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] te mānaganthābhibhuno, sabbadukkhamupaccagu''nti {sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagunti (pī0), sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagunti (aṭṭhakathā)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``lobhaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0233^ea^, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. lobhañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``dosaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. dosañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.
[21] rāgadosā atha moho, kodhamakkhā ^a^T0.0234^ea^ mānaṃ sabbaṃ.
[22] mānato rāgadosā puna dve, pakāsitā vaggamāhu paṭhamanti..

[03] ``mohaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. mohañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya ^a^P0.0007^ea^ na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``kodhaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. kodhañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``makkhaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya. makkhañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ tattha cittaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pahāya na punāyanti, imaṃ lokaṃ kudācana''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanīvaraṇampi samanupassāmi yena {yenevaṃ (?)} nīvaraṇena nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ ^a^V0.0008^ea^ sandhāvanti saṃsaranti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, avijjānīvaraṇaṃ {avijjānīvaraṇena (?)}. avijjānīvaraṇena hi, bhikkhave, nivutā pajā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``natthañño ^a^M0.0201^ea^ ekadhammopi, yenevaṃ {yeneva (sī0 pī0 ka0)} nivutā pajā.
[21] ``ye ca mohaṃ pahantvāna, tamokhandhaṃ {tamokkhandhaṃ (sī0 syā0 pī0)} padālayuṃ.
[22] na te puna saṃsaranti, hetu tesaṃ na vijjatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaṃyojanampi samanupassāmi yena {yenevaṃ (syā0)} saṃyojanena saṃyuttā sattā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsaranti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, taṇhāsaṃyojanaṃ {taṇhāsaṃyojanena (?)}. taṇhāsaṃyojanena hi, bhikkhave, saṃyuttā sattā dīgharattaṃ sandhāvanti saṃsarantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``etamādīnavaṃ {evamādīnavaṃ (sī0 pī0 ka0)} ñatvā, taṇhaṃ {taṇhā (sī0 ka0)} dukkhassa sambhavaṃ.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamānasassa anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānassa viharato ajjhattikaṃ aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikāro. yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati ^a^M0.0202^ea^, kusalaṃ bhāvetī''ti ^a^T0.0237^ea^. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] yoniso padahaṃ bhikkhu, khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamānasassa anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānassa viharato bāhiraṃ aṅganti karitvā nāññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, kalyāṇamittatā. kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[03] ``ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno ^a^P0.0011^ea^ uppajjati bahujanāhitāya bahujanāsukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ. katamo ekadhammo? saṅghabhedo. saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍanāni ceva honti, aññamaññaṃ paribhāsā ca honti ^a^T0.0238^ea^, aññamaññaṃ parikkhepā ca honti, aññamaññaṃ pariccajanā ca honti. tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hotī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[27] vaggārāmo adhammaṭṭho, yogakkhemā padhaṃsati {yogakkhemato dhaṃsati (syā0 pī0), yogakkhemā vimaṃsati (sī0 ka0)}.
[22] saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ bhetvāna {bhitvāna (sī0 ka0), bhinditvā (cūḷava0 354; a0 ni0 10.39)}, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. katamo ekadhammo ^a^P0.0012^ea^? saṅghasāmaggī. saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍanāni honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ paribhāsā honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ parikkhepā honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ pariccajanā honti. tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hotī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ katvāna, kappaṃ saggamhi modatī''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0011^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `imamhi cāyaṃ samaye puggalo kālaṅkareyya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye'. taṃ kissa hetu? cittaṃ hissa, bhikkhave, paduṭṭhaṃ. cetopadosahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.
[21] moho kodho atha makkho, vijjā taṇhā sekhaduve ca.

[22] bhedo sāmaggipuggalo {mohakodha atha makkhāgato, mūhā kāmasekkhaduve. bhedasāmaggapuggalo ca (sī0 ka0) mohakodhā atha makkho mohakāmā sekkhā duve. bhedamodā puggalo ca (syā0 pī0)}, vaggamāhu dutiyanti vuccatīti..

[03] ``idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ pasannacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi ^a^P0.0014^ea^ -- `imamhi cāyaṃ samaye puggalo kālaṃ kareyya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge'. taṃ kissa hetu? cittaṃ hissa, bhikkhave, pasannaṃ. cetopasādahetu kho pana, bhikkhave, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``mā, bhikkhave, puññānaṃ bhāyittha ^a^P0.0015^ea^. sukhassetaṃ, bhikkhave, adhivacanaṃ iṭṭhassa kantassa piyassa manāpassa yadidaṃ puññāni {puññānanti, (a0 ni0 7.62)}. abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ vipākaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ. satta vassāni mettacittaṃ bhāvetvā satta ^a^T0.0241^ea^ saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe ^a^V0.0013^ea^ nayimaṃ lokaṃ punarāgamāsiṃ. saṃvaṭṭamāne sudaṃ, bhikkhave, kappe ābhassarūpago homi; vivaṭṭamāne kappe suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmi.

[03] ``tatra sudaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmā homi mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī. chattiṃsakkhattuṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sakko ahosiṃ devānamindo; anekasatakkhattuṃ rājā ahosiṃ cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato. ko pana vādo padesarajjassa!

[03] ``tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `kissa nu kho me idaṃ kammassa phalaṃ, kissa kammassa vipāko, yenāhaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo'ti? tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `tiṇṇaṃ kho me idaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vipāko, yenāhaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvoti, seyyathidaṃ {seyyathīdaṃ (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} -- dānassa, damassa, saññamassā'''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] abyāpajjhaṃ {abyāpajjaṃ (syā0 ka0), abyābajjhaṃ (?)} sukhaṃ lokaṃ, paṇḍito upapajjatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``ekadhammo ^a^T0.0242^ea^, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati -- diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ samparāyikañca. katamo ekadhammo? appamādo kusalesu dhammesu. ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati -- diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ samparāyikañcā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``diṭṭhe ^a^P0.0017^ea^ dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, kappaṃ sandhāvato saṃsarato siyā evaṃ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi yathāyaṃ vepullo pabbato: sace saṃhārako assa, sambhatañca na vinasseyyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] siyā pabbatasamo rāsi, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``so kho panāyaṃ akkhāto, vepullo pabbato mahā.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] ``ekadhammaṃ atītassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa nāhaṃ tassa kiñci pāpakammaṃ akaraṇīyanti vadāmi. katamaṃ ekadhammaṃ? yadidaṃ {yathayidaṃ (sī0 syā0 ka0), yathāyidaṃ (pī0)} bhikkhave, sampajānamusāvādo''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``evañce, bhikkhave, sattā jāneyyuṃ dānasaṃvibhāgassa vipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi, na adatvā bhuñjeyyuṃ, na ca nesaṃ maccheramalaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya. yopi nesaṃ assa carimo ālopo carimaṃ kabaḷaṃ, tatopi na asaṃvibhajitvā bhuñjeyyuṃ, sace nesaṃ paṭiggāhakā assu. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, sattā ^a^P0.0019^ea^ na evaṃ jānanti dānasaṃvibhāgassa vipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi, tasmā adatvā bhuñjanti, maccheramalañca nesaṃ cittaṃ ^a^T0.0244^ea^ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] dajjuṃ kālena ariyesu, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ..
[22] ito cutā manussattā, saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā..
[21] ``te ^a^V0.0016^ea^ ca saggagatā {saggaṃ gatā (sī0 pī0 ka0)} tattha, modanti kāmakāmino.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] ``yāni kānici, bhikkhave, opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni sabbāni tāni mettāya cetovimuttiyā kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ. mettāyeva tāni cetovimutti adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[03] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā kāci tārakarūpānaṃ pabhā sabbā tā ^a^P0.0020^ea^ candiyā pabhāya kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, candapabhāyeva tā adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāni kānici opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni sabbāni tāni mettāya cetovimuttiyā kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, mettāyeva tāni cetovimutti ^a^T0.0245^ea^ adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[03] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vassānaṃ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve {nabhe (sī0)} ādicco nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno {abbhuggamamāno (ka0 aṭṭha0)} sabbaṃ ākāsagataṃ {ākāsaṃ (syā0)} tamagataṃ abhivihacca {abhihacca (syā0)} bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāni kānici opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni sabbāni tāni mettāya cetovimuttiyā kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, mettāyeva tāni cetovimutti adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[01] ``seyyathāpi ^a^M0.0209^ea^, bhikkhave, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ osadhitārakā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāni kānici opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni sabbāni tāni mettāya cetovimuttiyā kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ ^a^P0.0021^ea^, mettāyeva tāni cetovimutti adhiggahetvā bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati cā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``ekampi ce pāṇamaduṭṭhacitto, mettāyati kusalo tena hoti.
[22] sabbe ca pāṇe manasānukampaṃ, pahūtamariyo pakaroti puññaṃ..
[21] ``mettassa cittassa subhāvitassa, kalampi te nānubhavanti soḷasiṃ.

[22] mettaṃso sabbabhūtesu, veraṃ tassa na kenacī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.
[21] cittaṃ ^a^M0.0210^ea^ mettaṃ {jhāyī (sī0 syā0), jhāyi (pī0 ka0)} ubho atthe, puñjaṃ vepullapabbataṃ.
[22] sampajānamusāvādo, dānañca mettabhāvanā {mettabhāvañca (sī0 syā0 pī0), mettavācañca (ka0)}..
[21] sattimāni ca {sattimānidha (sī0 ka0)} suttāni, purimāni ca vīsati.
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ (dve ^a^M0.0211^ea^ ^a^V0.0018^ea^ dhamme anukkaṭi) {( ) syāmapotthake natthi} vuttañhetaṃ ^a^T0.0247^ea^ bhagavatā, vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ --

[03] ``dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ ^a^P0.0023^ea^ sapariḷāhaṃ; kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā. katamehi dvīhi? indriyesu aguttadvāratāya {aguttadvāro (aṭṭha0)} ca, bhojane amattaññutāya {amattaññū (aṭṭha0)} ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savidhātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ; kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo tathā mano.
[22] etāni yassa dvārāni, aguttānidha {aguttāni ca (syā0)} bhikkhuno..

[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[21] ``cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo tathā {atho (sī0 syā0 ka0)} mano.
[22] divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, sukhaṃ viharati tādiso''ti..

[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā tapanīyā. katame ^a^P0.0025^ea^ dve? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti, akatakusalo, akatabhīruttāṇo, katapāpo, kataluddo, katakibbiso. so `akataṃ me kalyāṇa'ntipi tappati, `kataṃ me pāpa'ntipi tappati. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā tapanīyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] kāyassa bhedā duppañño, nirayaṃ sopapajjatī''ti {nirayaṃ so upapajjatīti (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, dhammā atapanīyā. katame dve? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco katakalyāṇo hoti, katakusalo, katabhīruttāṇo, akatapāpo, akataluddo, akatakibbiso. so `kataṃ me kalyāṇa'ntipi na tappati, `akataṃ me pāpa'ntipi na tappati. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve ^a^P0.0026^ea^ dhammā atapanīyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] ``dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi dvīhi? pāpakena ca sīlena, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ ^a^T0.0250^ea^ iti vuccati --
[27] etehi dvīhi dhammehi, yo samannāgato naro.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. katamehi dvīhi ^a^P0.0027^ea^? bhaddakena ca sīlena, bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyā. imehi ^a^M0.0214^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[27] etehi dvīhi dhammehi, yo samannāgato naro.
[22] kāyassa bhedā sappañño, saggaṃ so upapajjatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``anātāpī, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anottāpī {anottappī (bahūsu) aṭṭhakathā passitabbā} abhabbo sambodhāya, abhabbo nibbānāya, abhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. ātāpī ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ottāpī {ottappī (bahūsu)} bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo nibbānāya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca ^a^T0.0251^ea^. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yo ^a^P0.0028^ea^ ca satimā nipako jhāyī, ātāpī ottāpī ca appamatto.
[22] saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvā, idheva sambodhimanuttaraṃ phuse''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[01] ``nayidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanatthaṃ, na janalapanatthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthaṃ, na `iti maṃ jano jānātū'ti. atha kho idaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0215^ea^, brahmacariyaṃ vussati saṃvaratthañceva pahānatthañcā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``esa maggo mahattehi {mahantehi (sī0 ka0), mahatthehi (syā0)}, anuyāto ^a^P0.0029^ea^ mahesibhi {mahesino (sī0 ka0)}.
[27] ye ye taṃ paṭipajjanti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ.
[03] ayampi ^a^T0.0252^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[01] ``nayidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanatthaṃ, na janalapanatthaṃ, na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthaṃ, na `iti maṃ jano jānātū'ti. atha kho idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ ^a^V0.0023^ea^ vussati abhiññatthañceva pariññatthañcā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[27] ye ye taṃ paṭipajjanti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu ^a^P0.0030^ea^ diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa {yoniso (sī0 syā0 pī0), yonissa (ka0)} āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya. katamehi ^a^M0.0216^ea^ dvīhi? saṃvejanīyesu ṭhānesu saṃvejanena, saṃviggassa ca yoniso padhānena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.
[21] dve ca bhikkhū tapanīyā, tapanīyā paratthehi.
[22] ātāpī {dve pādā (ka0), dve ātāpī (sī0)} nakuhanā dve {na kuhanā ca (sabbattha)}, somanassena te dasāti..

[03] ``tathāgataṃ, bhikkhave, arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā bahulaṃ samudācaranti -- khemo ca vitakko, paviveko ca {viveko ca (syā0)}. abyāpajjhārāmo {abyāpajjārāmo (ka0), abyābajjhārāmo (?)}, bhikkhave, tathāgato abyāpajjharato. tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ abyāpajjhārāmaṃ abyāpajjharataṃ eseva vitakko bahulaṃ samudācarati -- `imāyāhaṃ iriyāya na kiñci byābādhemi tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā'ti.
[03] ``pavivekārāmo ^a^M0.0217^ea^, bhikkhave, tathāgato pavivekarato. tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ pavivekārāmaṃ pavivekarataṃ eseva vitakko bahulaṃ samudācarati -- `yaṃ akusalaṃ taṃ pahīna'nti.

[03] ``tasmātiha, bhikkhave, tumhepi abyāpajjhārāmā ^a^T0.0254^ea^ viharatha ^a^P0.0032^ea^ abyāpajjharatā. tesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ abyāpajjhārāmānaṃ viharataṃ abyāpajjharatānaṃ eseva vitakko bahulaṃ samudācarissati -- `imāya mayaṃ iriyāya na kiñci byābādhema tasaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā'ti.

[01] ``pavivekārāmā, bhikkhave, viharatha pavivekaratā. tesaṃ vo, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ pavivekārāmānaṃ viharataṃ pavivekaratānaṃ eseva vitakko bahulaṃ samudācarissati -- `kiṃ akusalaṃ, kiṃ appahīnaṃ, kiṃ pajahāmā'''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] khemo vitakko paṭhamo udīrito, tato viveko dutiyo pakāsito..
[21] ``tamonudaṃ ^a^V0.0025^ea^ pāragataṃ mahesiṃ, taṃ pattipattaṃ vasimaṃ anāsavaṃ.
[27] visantaraṃ {vesantaraṃ (sī0 ka0), vissantaraṃ (pī0)} taṇhakkhaye vimuttaṃ, taṃ ve muniṃ antimadehadhāriṃ.
[22] mārañjahaṃ ^a^P0.0033^ea^ {mārajahaṃ (syā0), mānajahaṃ (sī0 ka0), mānaṃ jahaṃ (pī0)} brūmi jarāya pāraguṃ..
[21] ``sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, yathāpi passe janataṃ samantato.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa dve dhammadesanā pariyāyena bhavanti. katamā dve? `pāpaṃ pāpakato passathā'ti -- ayaṃ paṭhamā dhammadesanā; `pāpaṃ pāpakato disvā tattha nibbindatha virajjatha vimuccathā'ti -- ayaṃ dutiyā dhammadesanā. tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammāsambuddhassa imā dve dhammadesanā pariyāyena bhavantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pariyāyavacanaṃ passa, dve ca dhammā pakāsitā..
[21] ``pāpakaṃ ^a^P0.0034^ea^ passatha cetaṃ {cekaṃ (sī0 pī0), chekā (syā0)}, tattha cāpi virajjatha.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``avijjā ^a^V0.0026^ea^, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā anvadeva ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ; vijjā ca kho, bhikkhave, pubbaṅgamā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ^a^T0.0256^ea^ samāpattiyā anvadeva hirottappa''nti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yā kācimā duggatiyo, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
[22] tato pāpaṃ pasavati, apāyaṃ tena gacchati..
[22] vijjaṃ uppādayaṃ bhikkhu, sabbā duggatiyo jahe''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^P0.0035^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``te, bhikkhave, sattā suparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnā. te diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharanti savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ; kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā. te {te ca kho (?)}, bhikkhave, sattā aparihīnā ye ariyāya paññāya aparihīnā. te diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṃ viharanti avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ; kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[01] ``dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. katame dve? hirī {hiri (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)} ca, ottappañca. ime ce, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha mātāti vā mātucchāti vā mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vā. sambhedaṃ loko agamissa yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā {soṇasigālā (sī0 syā0 kaṃ0 pī0)}. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, ime dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti tasmā paññāyati mātāti vā mātucchāti vā mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yesaṃ ^a^M0.0220^ea^ ce hiriottappaṃ, sabbadā ca na vijjati.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[01] ``atthi, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0258^ea^, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ. no cetaṃ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa ^a^V0.0028^ea^ katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] jarāmaraṇasaṅghāṭaṃ, roganīḷaṃ {roganiḍḍhaṃ (sī0)} pabhaṅguraṃ {pabhaṅgunaṃ (ka0 sī0 ka0), pabhaṅguṇaṃ (syā0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] ``dvemā, bhikkhave, nibbānadhātuyo. katame dve? saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu.

[03] ``katamā ^a^M0.0221^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, saupādisesā nibbānadhātu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto. tassa tiṭṭhanteva pañcindriyāni yesaṃ avighātattā {avigatattā (sī0 aṭṭha0)} manāpāmanāpaṃ paccanubhoti, sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti ^a^T0.0259^ea^. tassa yo rāgakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo -- ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, saupādisesā nibbānadhātu.

[03] ``katamā ca, bhikkhave, anupādisesā nibbānadhātu? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto. tassa idheva, bhikkhave, sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sīti bhavissanti {sītībhavissanti (?)}. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, anupādisesā nibbānadhātu. imā kho, bhikkhave, dve nibbānadhātuyo''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``duve ^a^V0.0029^ea^ imā cakkhumatā pakāsitā, nibbānadhātū anissitena tādinā.
[27] ekā hi dhātu idha diṭṭhadhammikā, saupādisesā bhavanettisaṅkhayā.
[22] anupādisesā ^a^P0.0039^ea^ pana samparāyikā, yamhi nirujjhanti bhavāni sabbaso..
[22] te dhammasārādhigamā khaye ratā, pahaṃsu te sabbabhavāni tādino''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[03] ``paṭisallānārāmā ^a^T0.0260^ea^ {paṭisallānārāmā (ka0)}, bhikkhave, viharatha paṭisallānaratā, ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyuttā, anirākatajjhānā, vipassanāya samannāgatā, brūhetā suññāgārānaṃ ^a^M0.0222^ea^. paṭisallānārāmānaṃ, bhikkhave, viharataṃ paṭisallānaratānaṃ ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyuttānaṃ anirākatamajjhānānaṃ vipassanāya samannāgatānaṃ brūhetānaṃ suññāgārānaṃ dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``ye santacittā nipakā, satimanto ca {satimantova (sī0 ka0)} jhāyino.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``sikkhānisaṃsā ^a^V0.0030^ea^, bhikkhave, viharatha paññuttarā vimuttisārā satādhipateyyā. sikkhānisaṃsānaṃ, bhikkhave, viharataṃ paññuttarānaṃ vimuttisārānaṃ satādhipateyyānaṃ dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] taṃ ve muniṃ antimadehadhāriṃ, mārañjahaṃ brūmi jarāya pāraguṃ..
[22] māraṃ sasenaṃ abhibhuyya bhikkhavo, bhavatha jātimaraṇassa pāragā''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``jāgaro cassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sato sampajāno samāhito pamudito vippasanno ca tattha kālavipassī ca kusalesu dhammesu. jāgarassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato satassa sampajānassa samāhitassa pamuditassa vippasannassa tattha kālavipassino kusalesu dhammesu dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ -- diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] suttā jāgaritaṃ seyyo, natthi jāgarato bhayaṃ..
[21] ``yo ^a^P0.0042^ea^ jāgaro ca satimā sampajāno, samāhito mudito vippasanno ca.
[22] kālena ^a^T0.0262^ea^ so sammā dhammaṃ parivīmaṃsamāno, ekodibhūto vihane tamaṃ so..
[21] ``tasmā have jāgariyaṃ bhajetha, ātāpī bhikkhu nipako jhānalābhī.
[22] saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvā, idheva sambodhimanuttaraṃ phuse''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0031^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.

[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāya. katame dve? yo ca abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño, yo ca paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantaṃ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṃseti. ime kho, bhikkhave, dve āpāyikā nerayikā idamappahāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``abhūtavādī ^a^M0.0224^ea^ nirayaṃ upeti, yo vāpi katvā na karomi cāha.

[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. ekādasamaṃ.
[03] ``dvīhi, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhitā devamanussā olīyanti eke, atidhāvanti eke; cakkhumanto ca passanti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^V0.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, atidhāvanti eke? bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṃ abhinandanti ^a^P0.0044^ea^ -- yato kira, bho, ayaṃ attā {satto (sī0 ka0)} kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti paraṃ maraṇā; etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītaṃ etaṃ yāthāvanti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atidhāvanti eke.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto passanti? idha bhikkhu bhūtaṃ bhūtato passati; bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cakkhumanto passantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``ye ^a^M0.0225^ea^ {yo (syā0 ka0)} bhūtaṃ bhūtato disvā, bhūtassa ca atikkamaṃ.

[21] dve indriyā dve tapanīyā, sīlena apare duve.

[03] imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``tisso imā ^a^T0.0266^ea^, bhikkhave, vedanā. katamā tisso? sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā. sukhā, bhikkhave, vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā; dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā; adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhā vedanā dukkhato diṭṭhā hoti, dukkhā vedanā sallato diṭṭhā hoti, adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato diṭṭhā hoti; ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu ariyo sammaddaso acchecchi {acchejji (sī0 pī0), acchijji (ka0)}, taṇhaṃ, vivattayi ^a^V0.0035^ea^ {vāvattayi (sī0 aṭṭha0)} saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā'''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --

[22] abhiññāvosito santo, sa ve yogātigo munī''ti..

[01] ``tisso imā, bhikkhave, esanā. katamā tisso? kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā ^a^V0.0036^ea^ -- imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso esanā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --

[22] dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhini''nti {savāhananti (bahūsu)}..

[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā. te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, puttā santo saṃvijjamānā ^a^P0.0063^ea^ lokasmiṃ. katame tayo? atijāto, anujāto, avajātoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^T0.0279^ea^, bhikkhave, putto atijāto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, puttassa mātāpitaro honti na buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, na dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, na saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā; pāṇātipātā appaṭiviratā, adinnādānā appaṭiviratā, kāmesumicchācārā appaṭiviratā, musāvādā appaṭiviratā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭiviratā, dussīlā pāpadhammā. putto ca nesaṃ hoti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato; pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, adinnādānā paṭivirato, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato, musāvādā paṭivirato, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato, sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, putto atijāto hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^M0.0239^ea^, bhikkhave, putto anujāto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, puttassa mātāpitaro honti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā; pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā, adinnādānā paṭiviratā, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā, musāvādā paṭiviratā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā, sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā. puttopi nesaṃ hoti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato; pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, adinnādānā paṭivirato, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato, musāvādā paṭivirato, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato, sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, putto anujāto hoti.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^T0.0280^ea^, bhikkhave, putto avajāto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, puttassa mātāpitaro honti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā; pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā, adinnādānā paṭiviratā, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā, musāvādā paṭiviratā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā, sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā. putto ca nesaṃ hoti na buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, na dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, na saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato; pāṇātipātā appaṭivirato, adinnādānā appaṭivirato, kāmesumicchācārā ^a^P0.0064^ea^ appaṭivirato, musāvādā appaṭivirato, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭivirato, dussīlo pāpadhammo. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, putto avajāto ^a^V0.0048^ea^ hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puttā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi''nti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano..
[21] ``ete kho puttā lokasmiṃ, ye bhavanti upāsakā.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.
[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. katame tayo? avuṭṭhikasamo ^a^T0.0281^ea^, padesavassī, sabbatthābhivassī.

[03] ``kathañca ^a^M0.0240^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaññeva na dātā hoti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ {... vaṇibbakayācakānaṃ (sī0)} annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ ^a^P0.0065^ea^ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccānaṃ dātā (hoti) {( ) natthi syāmapotthake}, ekaccānaṃ na dātā hoti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti.

[03] ``kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaṃva deti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti. ime ^a^V0.0049^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmi''nti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] taṃ ve avuṭṭhikasamoti, āhu naṃ purisādhamaṃ..
[22] taṃ ve padesavassīti, āhu medhāvino janā..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, sukhāni patthayamāno sīlaṃ rakkheyya paṇḍito. katamāni tīṇi? pasaṃsā me āgacchatūti {āgacchantūti (syā0)} sīlaṃ rakkheyya paṇḍito, bhogā me uppajjantūti sīlaṃ rakkheyya paṇḍito, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmīti sīlaṃ rakkheyya paṇḍito. imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi sukhāni patthayamāno sīlaṃ rakkheyya paṇḍito''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] saṅkiyo hoti pāpasmiṃ, avaṇṇo cassa rūhati..
[22] sa ^a^P0.0068^ea^ ve tādisako hoti, sahavāso hi {sahavāsopi (sī0 ka0)} tādiso..
[22] asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggati''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.
[03] ``bhidurāyaṃ {bhindantāyaṃ (syā0 pī0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, kāyo, viññāṇaṃ virāgadhammaṃ, sabbe upadhī aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``kāyañca ^a^V0.0051^ea^ bhiduraṃ {bhindantaṃ (syā0 pī0 ka0)} ñatvā, viññāṇañca virāgunaṃ {virāgikaṃ (ka0 sī0), pabhaṅguṇaṃ (syā0)}.
[22] sampatvā paramaṃ santiṃ, kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvitatto''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``dhātuso, bhikkhave, sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti. hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti.

[03] ``atītampi, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu. hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu.

[03] ``anāgatampi ^a^M0.0243^ea^, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti. hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandissanti samessanti.

[03] ``etarahipi, bhikkhave, paccuppanaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti. hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, kalyāṇādhimuttikā sattā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi sattehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti, kammarato, kammārāmatamanuyutto; bhassārāmo hoti, bhassarato, bhassārāmatamanuyutto; niddārāmo hoti, niddārato, niddārāmatamanuyutto. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattanti. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, sekho bhikkhu na kammārāmo hoti, na kammarato, na kammārāmatamanuyutto; na bhassārāmo hoti, na bhassarato, na bhassārāmatamanuyutto; na niddārāmo hoti, na niddārato ^a^M0.0244^ea^ ^a^P0.0072^ea^, na niddārāmatamanuyutto. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammā sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] bhabbo so tādiso bhikkhu, phuṭṭhuṃ sambodhimuttama''nti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0053^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.
[21] dve diṭṭhī nissaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ, putto avuṭṭhikena ca.
[22] sukhā ca bhiduro {bhindanā (sabbattha)} dhātu, parihānena te dasāti..

[01] ``tayome, bhikkhave, akusalavitakkā. katame tayo? anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā''ti ^a^P0.0073^ea^. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yo ca puttapasuṃ hitvā, vivāhe saṃharāni {saṅgahāni (ka0 sī0 syā0 pī0)} ca.
[22] bhabbo so tādiso bhikkhu, phuṭṭhuṃ sambodhimuttama''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.
[03] ``diṭṭhā ^a^V0.0054^ea^ ^a^T0.0287^ea^ mayā, bhikkhave, sattā sakkārena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā asakkārena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā sakkārena ca asakkārena ca tadubhayena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ ^a^P0.0074^ea^ nirayaṃ upapannā.

[03] ``taṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, nāññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā sutvā vadāmi; ( ) {(diṭṭhā mayā bhikkhave sattā sakkārena abhibhūtā. ...pe0... asakkārena abhibhūtā ...pe0... sakkārena ca asakkārena ca tadubhayena abhibhūtā pariyādinnacittā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.) (syā0) purimavagge micchādiṭṭhikasammādiṭṭhikasuttehi pana sameti, anvayabyatirekavākyānaṃ pana anantaritattā pāsaṃsatarā.)} api ca, bhikkhave, yadeva me sāmaṃ ñātaṃ sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sāmaṃ viditaṃ tamevāhaṃ vadāmi.
[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā sakkārena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā asakkārena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ ^a^T0.0288^ea^ upapannā.

[03] ``diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, sattā sakkārena ca asakkārena ca tadubhayena abhibhūtā, pariyādinnacittā, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, devesu devasaddā niccharanti samayā samayaṃ upādāya. katame tayo? yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāya ceteti, tasmiṃ samaye {tasmiṃ bhikkhave samaye (pī0 ka0)} devesu devasaddo niccharati -- `eso ariyasāvako mārena saddhiṃ saṅgāmāya cetetī'ti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṃ upādāya.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye ariyasāvako sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati, tasmiṃ samaye devesu devasaddo niccharati -- `eso ariyasāvako mārena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetī'ti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṃ upādāya.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye ariyasāvako āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja ^a^T0.0289^ea^ viharati, tasmiṃ samaye devesu devasaddo niccharati -- `eso ariyasāvako vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṃ abhivijiya ajjhāvasatī'ti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo devesu devasaddo niccharati samayā samayaṃ upādāya. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo devesu devasaddā niccharanti samayā samayaṃ upādāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] tañhi tassa na passanti, yena maccuvasaṃ vaje''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0056^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``yadā, bhikkhave, devo devakāyā cavanadhammo hoti, pañcassa pubbanimittāni pātubhavanti -- mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, sake devo devāsane nābhiramatīti. tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, devā `cavanadhammo ayaṃ devaputto'ti iti viditvā tīhi vācāhi anumodenti {anumodanti (sī0 syā0 pī0)} -- `ito, bho, sugatiṃ gaccha, sugatiṃ gantvā ^a^P0.0077^ea^ suladdhalābhaṃ labha, suladdhalābhaṃ labhitvā suppatiṭṭhito bhavāhī'''ti.

[03] evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``kinnu kho, bhante, devānaṃ sugatigamanasaṅkhātaṃ; kiñca, bhante, devānaṃ suladdhalābhasaṅkhātaṃ ^a^T0.0290^ea^; kiṃ pana, bhante, devānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitasaṅkhāta''nti?

[03] ``manussattaṃ kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syā0 pī0)}, devānaṃ sugatigamanasaṅkhātaṃ; yaṃ manussabhūto samāno tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. idaṃ kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syā0 pī0)}, devānaṃ suladdhalābhasaṅkhātaṃ; sā kho panassa saddhā niviṭṭhā hoti mūlajātā patiṭṭhitā daḷhā asaṃhāriyā samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ. idaṃ kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (syā0 pī0)}, devānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitasaṅkhāta''nti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ```tato opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, katvā dānena taṃ bahuṃ.
[22] aññepi macce saddhamme, brahmacariye nivesaya' {nivesaye (sī0 syā0)}..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] ``tayome puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro ^a^P0.0079^ea^ purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā. so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo puggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, tasseva satthu {satthuno (syā0)} sāvako arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano ^a^M0.0249^ea^ sammadaññā vimutto. so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo puggalo loke uppajjamāno ^a^V0.0058^ea^ uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, tasseva satthu sāvako sekho hoti pāṭipado bahussuto sīlavatūpapanno. sopi {so (?)} dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ ^a^T0.0292^ea^ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo puggalo loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna''nti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``satthā hi loke paṭhamo mahesi, tassanvayo sāvako bhāvitatto.
[22] apāpuranti {apāpurenti (ka0)} amatassa dvāraṃ, yogā pamocenti {yāgā pamuccanti (sī0), yogā mocanti (syā0)} hujjanaṃ te..
[22] idheva dukkhassa karonti antaṃ, ye appamattā sugatassa sāsane''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``asubhānupassī, bhikkhave, kāyasmiṃ viharatha; ānāpānassati ca vo ajjhattaṃ parimukhaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hotu; sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassino ^a^T0.0293^ea^ viharatha. asubhānupassīnaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyasmiṃ viharataṃ yo subhāya dhātuyā rāgānusayo so pahīyati {pahiyyati (ka0)}. ānāpānassatiyā ajjhattaṃ parimukhaṃ sūpaṭṭhititāya ye bāhirā ^a^P0.0081^ea^ vitakkāsayā vighātapakkhikā, te na honti. sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassīnaṃ ^a^V0.0059^ea^ viharataṃ yā avijjā sā pahīyati, yā vijjā sā uppajjatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, yato tattha vimuccati.
[22] abhiññāvosito santo, sa ve yogātigo munī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``dhammānudhammapaṭipannassa bhikkhuno ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya -- dhammānudhammapaṭipannoyanti bhāsamāno dhammaññeva bhāsati no adhammaṃ, vitakkayamāno vā dhammavitakkaññeva vitakketi no adhammavitakkaṃ, tadubhayaṃ vā pana abhinivejjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyati..
[21] ``caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[03] ``tayome ^a^V0.0060^ea^, bhikkhave, akusalavitakkā andhakaraṇā acakkhukaraṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā vighātapakkhikā anibbānasaṃvattanikā ^a^T0.0294^ea^. katame tayo? kāmavitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattaniko. byāpādavitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattaniko. vihiṃsāvitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattaniko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā andhakaraṇā acakkhukaraṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā vighātapakkhikā anibbānasaṃvattanikā.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, kusalavitakkā anandhakaraṇā cakkhukaraṇā ñāṇakaraṇā paññāvuddhikā avighātapakkhikā nibbānasaṃvattanikā. katame tayo? nekkhammavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattaniko. abyāpādavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattaniko. avihiṃsāvitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko ^a^P0.0083^ea^ nibbānasaṃvattaniko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo kusalavitakkā anandhakaraṇā cakkhukaraṇā ñāṇakaraṇā paññāvuddhikā avighātapakkhikā nibbānasaṃvattanikā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``tayo vitakke kusale vitakkaye, tayo ^a^T0.0295^ea^ pana akusale nirākare.
[27] sa ve vitakkāni vicāritāni, sameti vuṭṭhīva rajaṃ samūhataṃ.
[22] sa ve vitakkūpasamena cetasā, idheva so santipadaṃ samajjhagā''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā. katame tayo? lobho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto ^a^V0.0061^ea^ antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko. doso, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko. moho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``luddho ^a^P0.0084^ea^ atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ {andhaṃ tamaṃ (sī0)} tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ..
[21] ``yo ca lobhaṃ pahantvāna, lobhaneyye na lubbhati.
[21] ``duṭṭho atthaṃ na jānāti, duṭṭho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ doso sahate naraṃ..
[21] ``yo ca dosaṃ pahantvāna, dosaneyye na dussati.
[21] ``mūḷho atthaṃ na jānāti, mūḷho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ moho sahate naraṃ..
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ^a^V0.0062^ea^ ^a^P0.0085^ea^ ca mohaṃ pahantvāna, mohaneyye na muyhati.
[22] mohaṃ vihanti so sabbaṃ, ādiccovudayaṃ tama''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``tīhi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho. katamehi tīhi? pāpicchatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho. pāpamittatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho. sati kho pana uttarikaraṇīye {uttariṃ karaṇīye (syā0)} oramattakena visesādhigamena {visesādhigamena ca (syā0 pī0)} antarā vosānaṃ āpādi. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko ^a^T0.0297^ea^ kappaṭṭho atekiccho''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] jalaṃva yasasā aṭṭhā, devadattoti vissuto {me sutaṃ (pāḷiyaṃ)}..
[21] ``so pamāṇamanuciṇṇo {pamādamanuciṇṇo (ka0 sī0 syā0 pī0), samānamanuciṇṇo (aṭṭha0)}, āsajja naṃ tathāgataṃ.
[22] na so tena padūseyya, bhesmā hi udadhi mahā..
[22] sammaggataṃ ^a^P0.0087^ea^ {samaggataṃ (sī0 ka0)} santacittaṃ, vādo tamhi na rūhati..
[22] yassa maggānugo bhikkhu, khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, aggappasādā. katame tayo? yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā {bahupadā (ka0)} vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ^a^P0.0088^ea^. ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā. agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hoti.

[03] ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ madanimmadano pipāsavinayo ālayasamugghāto vaṭṭupacchedo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ye, bhikkhave, virāge dhamme pasannā, agge te pasannā. agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hoti.

[03] ``yāvatā ^a^V0.0064^ea^, bhikkhave, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā, tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā ^a^T0.0299^ea^ esa ^a^M0.0255^ea^ bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa. ye, bhikkhave, saṅghe pasannā, agge te pasannā. agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aggappasādā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] aggaṃ āyu ca vaṇṇo ca, yaso kitti sukhaṃ balaṃ..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ. abhisāpoyaṃ {abhisāpāyaṃ (sī0), abhilāpāyaṃ (syā0 pī0), abhisapāyaṃ (ka0)}, bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ -- `piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī'ti. tañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputtā upenti atthavasikā, atthavasaṃ paṭicca; neva rājābhinītā, na corābhinītā, na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā. api ca kho `otiṇṇamhā jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇā dukkhaparetā ^a^T0.0300^ea^, appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā'ti. evaṃ pabbajito cāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kulaputto so ^a^P0.0090^ea^ ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo, byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo, muṭṭhassati ^a^V0.0065^ea^ asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo. seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati ^a^M0.0256^ea^ na araññe: tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmi gihibhogā parihīno sāmaññatthañca na paripūretī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] pāpā pāpehi kammehi, nirayaṃ te upapajjare..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``saṅghāṭikaṇṇe cepi, bhikkhave ^a^P0.0091^ea^, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo; atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammañhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati. dhammaṃ apassanto ^a^T0.0301^ea^ na maṃ passati {maṃ na passati (syā0)}.

[03] ``yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya. so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo; atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati; dhammaṃ passanto maṃ passatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] giddho so vītagedhassa, passa yāvañca ārakā..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.
[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, aggī. katame tayo? rāgaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi -- ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aggī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[03] ``tathā tathā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu upaparikkheyya ^a^P0.0094^ea^ yathā yathāssa {yathā yathā (bahūsu)} upaparikkhato bahiddhā cassa viññāṇaṃ avikkhittaṃ avisaṭaṃ ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitaṃ anupādāya na paritasseyya. bahiddhā, bhikkhave, viññāṇe avikkhitte avisaṭe sati ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhite anupādāya aparitassato āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇadukkhasamudayasambhavo na hotī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``tisso imā, bhikkhave, kāmūpapattiyo {kāmuppattiyo (sī0)}. katamā tisso? paccupaṭṭhitakāmā, nimmānaratino ^a^V0.0068^ea^, paranimmitavasavattino -- imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso kāmūpapattiyo''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] sabbe pariccaje kāme, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``kāmayogayutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto āgāmī hoti āgantā {āgantvā (syā0 ka0)} itthattaṃ. kāmayogavisaṃyutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṃ. kāmayogavisaṃyutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogavisaṃyutto arahā hoti, khīṇāsavo''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] te ve pāraṅgatā loke, ye pattā āsavakkhaya''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.
[03] ``kalyāṇasīlo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṃ dhammavinaye `kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso'ti vuccati --

[03] ``kathañca ^a^T0.0304^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo hoti. iti kalyāṇasīlo.

[03] ``kalyāṇadhammo ^a^M0.0260^ea^ ca kathaṃ hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo hoti. iti kalyāṇasīlo, kalyāṇadhammo.

[03] ``kalyāṇapañño ca kathaṃ hoti ^a^P0.0097^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇapañño hoti.
[03] ``iti kalyāṇasīlo kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṃ dhammavinaye `kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso'ti vuccatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] taṃ ve kalyāṇasīloti, āhu bhikkhuṃ hirīmanaṃ {hirīmataṃ (syā0 ka0)}..
[22] taṃ ve kalyāṇadhammoti, āhu bhikkhuṃ anussadaṃ..
[22] taṃ ve kalyāṇapaññoti, āhu bhikkhuṃ anāsavaṃ..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.
[03] ``dvemāni ^a^P0.0098^ea^, bhikkhave, dānāni -- āmisadānañca dhammadānañca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ dānānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammadānaṃ.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, saṃvibhāgā -- āmisasaṃvibhāgo ca dhammasaṃvibhāgo ca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saṃvibhāgānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammasaṃvibhāgo.

[03] ``dveme ^a^M0.0261^ea^, bhikkhave, anuggahā -- āmisānuggaho ca dhammānuggaho ca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ anuggahānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammānuggaho''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yamāhu dānaṃ paramaṃ anuttaraṃ, yaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ bhagavā avaṇṇayi {avaṇṇayī (sī0)}.
[22] aggamhi khettamhi pasannacitto, viññū pajānaṃ ko na yajetha kāle..
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0071^ea^ ceva bhāsanti suṇanti cūbhayaṃ, pasannacittā sugatassa sāsane.
[22] tesaṃ so attho paramo visujjhati, ye appamattā sugatassa sāsane''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.
[01] ``dhammenāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemi, nāññaṃ lapitalāpanamattena.

[03] ``kathañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemi, nāññaṃ lapitalāpanamattena? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ ^a^P0.0099^ea^ -- ekampi ^a^T0.0306^ea^ jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe -- `amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto. so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ. tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto. so tato cuto idhūpapanno'ti ^a^M0.0262^ea^. iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati. ayamassa paṭhamā vijjā adhigatā hoti, avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno, yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti -- `ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā. te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā. ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā ^a^T0.0307^ea^ manosucaritena ^a^P0.0100^ea^ samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā. te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena ^a^V0.0072^ea^ atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti. ayamassa dutiyā vijjā adhigatā hoti, avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno, yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati. ayamassa tatiyā vijjā adhigatā hoti, avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno, yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato. evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammena tevijjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ paññāpemi, nāññaṃ lapitalāpanamattenā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] atho {atha (syā0 ka0)} jātikkhayaṃ patto, abhiññāvosito muni..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.
[22] upapatti {uppatti (sī0)} kāma kalyāṇaṃ, dānaṃ dhammena te dasāti..

[03] ``ahamasmi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo yācayogo sadā payatapāṇi {payatapāṇī (sī0 syā0)} antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto. tassa me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā dhammajā dhammanimmitā dhammadāyādā, no āmisadāyādā.
[03] ``dvemāni, bhikkhave, dānāni -- āmisadānañca ^a^P0.0102^ea^ dhammadānañca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ dānānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammadānaṃ.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, saṃvibhāgā -- āmisasaṃvibhāgo ca dhammasaṃvibhāgo ca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saṃvibhāgānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammasaṃvibhāgo.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, anuggahā -- āmisānuggaho ca dhammānuggaho ca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ anuggahānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammānuggaho.
[03] ``dveme, bhikkhave, yāgā -- āmisayāgo ca dhammayāgo ca. etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ yāgānaṃ yadidaṃ -- dhammayāgo''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``yo ^a^T0.0309^ea^ dhammayāgaṃ ayajī amaccharī, tathāgato sabbabhūtānukampī {sabbasattānukampī (syā0) aṭṭhakathāyampi}.
[22] taṃ tādisaṃ devamanussaseṭṭhaṃ, sattā namassanti bhavassa pāragu''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. paṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni. katamāni cattāri? paṃsukūlaṃ, bhikkhave, cīvarānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ. piṇḍiyālopo ^a^M0.0265^ea^, bhikkhave, bhojanānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ. rukkhamūlaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^P0.0103^ea^, senāsanānaṃ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṃ. pūtimuttaṃ, bhikkhave, bhesajjānaṃ appañca sulabhañca tañca anavajjaṃ. imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭho hoti sulabhena ca (anavajjena ca) {(...) natthi sī0 pī0 ka0 potthakesu ca aṅguttare ca}, imassāhaṃ aññataraṃ sāmaññaṅganti vadāmī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dutiyaṃ.

[03] ``jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi ^a^T0.0310^ea^, no ajānato no apassato. kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato, kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti? idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo ^a^P0.0104^ea^ hoti. ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti. ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti. ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti, bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti. evaṃ kho ^a^V0.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[22] khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā..
[22] uppajjati khaye ñāṇaṃ, khīṇā saṃyojanā iti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. tatiyaṃ.

[03] ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā ^a^P0.0105^ea^ vā `idaṃ dukkha'nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo'ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhanirodho'ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā'ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānanti -- na me te, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā, na ca panete āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṃ vā brahmaññatthaṃ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā ^a^T0.0311^ea^ upasampajja viharanti.

[03] ``ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā `idaṃ dukkha'nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo'ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhanirodho'ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti; `ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā'ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānanti -- te kho me, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ, asesaṃ uparujjhati.
[22] abhabbā te antakiriyāya, te ve jātijarūpagā..
[21] ``ye ^a^M0.0267^ea^ ca dukkhaṃ pajānanti, atho dukkhassa sambhavaṃ.
[27] yattha ca sabbaso dukkhaṃ, asesaṃ uparujjhati.
[22] bhabbā te antakiriyāya, na te jātijarūpagā''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. catutthaṃ.

[01] ``ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sīlasampannā samādhisampannā ^a^P0.0107^ea^ paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā ovādakā ^a^T0.0312^ea^ viññāpakā sandassakā samādapakā samuttejakā sampahaṃsakā alaṃsamakkhātāro saddhammassa dassanampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi; savanampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi; upasaṅkamanampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi; payirupāsanampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi; anussaraṇampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi; anupabbajjampahaṃ {anussatimpahaṃ (syā0)}, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi. taṃ kissa hetu? tathārūpe, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sevato bhajato payirupāsato aparipūropi sīlakkhandho bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati, aparipūropi samādhikkhandho bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati, aparipūropi ^a^P0.0108^ea^ paññākkhandho bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati, aparipūropi vimuttikkhandho bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati, aparipūropi vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandho bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati. evarūpā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū satthārotipi ^a^V0.0077^ea^ vuccanti, satthavāhātipi vuccanti, raṇañjahātipi vuccanti, tamonudātipi vuccanti, ālokakarātipi vuccanti, obhāsakarātipi vuccanti, pajjotakarātipi vuccanti, ukkādhārātipi vuccanti, pabhaṅkarātipi vuccanti, ariyātipi vuccanti, cakkhumantotipi vuccantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``pāmojjakaraṇaṃ ^a^M0.0268^ea^ ṭhānaṃ {... karaṇaṭhānaṃ (sī0 syā0)}, etaṃ hoti vijānataṃ.
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. pañcamaṃ.

[03] ``cattārome, bhikkhave, taṇhuppādā, yattha bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati. katame cattāro? cīvarahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati; piṇḍapātahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati; senāsanahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati; itibhavābhavahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro taṇhuppādā yattha bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. chaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ``sabrahmakāni, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. sapubbadevatāni ^a^P0.0110^ea^, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṃ ^a^M0.0269^ea^ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. sapubbācariyakāni, bhikkhave, tāni kulāni yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti. sāhuneyyakāni, bhikkhave, tāni ^a^T0.0314^ea^ kulāni yesaṃ puttānaṃ mātāpitaro ajjhāgāre pūjitā honti.

[03] ```brahmā'ti, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. `pubbadevatā'ti, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. `pubbācariyā'ti, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. `āhuneyyā'ti, bhikkhave, mātāpitūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. taṃ kissa hetu? bahukārā, bhikkhave, mātāpitaro puttānaṃ āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito.
[27] annena ^a^P0.0111^ea^ atha pānena, vatthena sayanena ca.
[22] idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī''ti..
[03] ayampi ^a^V0.0079^ea^ attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. sattamaṃ.

[03] ``bahukārā {bahūpakārā (sī0 pī0)}, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇagahapatikā tumhākaṃ ye vo {ye te (sabbattha)} paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi. tumhepi, bhikkhave, bahukārā brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ yaṃ {ye (?)} nesaṃ dhammaṃ desetha ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetha. evamidaṃ, bhikkhave, aññamaññaṃ nissāya brahmacariyaṃ vussati oghassa nittharaṇatthāya sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. aṭṭhamaṃ.

[03] ``ye keci, bhikkhave, bhikkhū kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī unnaḷā asamāhitā, na me te ^a^V0.0080^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā. apagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā; na ca te {na ca te bhikkhave bhikkhū (sī0 pī0 ka0)} imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ^a^P0.0113^ea^ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti. ye ca kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhū nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā atthaddhā susamāhitā, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā. anapagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā; te ca imasmiṃ dhammavinaye {imasmiṃ ca te dhammavinaye (syā0), te bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye (ka0)} vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. navamaṃ.

[03] ``seyyathāpi ^a^T0.0316^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso nadiyā sotena ^a^P0.0114^ea^ ovuyheyya piyarūpasātarūpena. tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito disvā evaṃ vadeyya -- `kiñcāpi kho tvaṃ, ambho purisa, nadiyā sotena ovuyhasi piyarūpasātarūpena, atthi cettha heṭṭhā rahado saūmi sāvaṭṭo sagaho sarakkhaso yaṃ tvaṃ, ambho purisa, rahadaṃ pāpuṇitvā maraṇaṃ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkha'nti. atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso tassa purisassa saddaṃ sutvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca paṭisotaṃ vāyameyya.
[03] ``upamā kho me ayaṃ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa viññāpanāya. ayaṃ cettha {ayaṃ cevettha (syā0)} attho -- `nadiyā soto'ti kho, bhikkhave, taṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[03] ```piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa'nti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[21] ```heṭṭhā ^a^V0.0081^ea^ rahado'ti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[26] ```āvaṭṭa'nti kho {sāvaṭṭoti kho (bahūsu)}, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[27] ```gaharakkhaso'ti kho {sagaho sarakkhasoti kho (bahūsu)}, bhikkhave, mātugāmassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[22] ```hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmo'ti kho, bhikkhave, vīriyārambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
[03] ```cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhitoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``sahāpi ^a^M0.0272^ea^ dukkhena jaheyya kāme, yogakkhemaṃ āyatiṃ patthayāno.
[27] sammappajāno ^a^T0.0317^ea^ suvimuttacitto, vimuttiyā phassaye tattha tatth.
[22] sa vedagū vūsitabrahmacariyo, lokantagū pāragatoti vuccatī''ti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. dasamaṃ.

[03] ``carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti {byantikaroti (sī0 pī0), byantaṃ karoti (ka0)} anabhāvaṃ gameti. carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto anātāpī anottāpī ^a^P0.0116^ea^ {anottappī (sabbattha) dukanipāte, aṅguttare 1.4.11 passitabbaṃ} satataṃ samitaṃ kusīto hīnavīriyoti vuccati.

[03] ``ṭhitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti. ṭhitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto anātāpī anottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ kusīto hīnavīriyoti vuccati.

[03] ``nisinnassa ^a^V0.0082^ea^ cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti. nisinnopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto anātāpī anottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ kusīto hīnavīriyoti vuccati.

[03] ``sayānassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jāgarassa uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivāseti ^a^M0.0273^ea^ nappajahati ^a^T0.0318^ea^ na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti. sayānopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgaro evaṃbhūto anātāpī anottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ kusīto hīnavīriyoti vuccati.

[03] ``carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī {ottappī (sabbattha)} satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.

[03] ``ṭhitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. ṭhitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ^a^P0.0117^ea^ ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.

[03] ``nisinnassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. nisinnopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.

[03] ``sayānassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jāgarassa uppajjati kāmavitakko vā byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā. tañce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. sayānopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jāgaro evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ ^a^T0.0319^ea^ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccatī''ti. etamatthaṃ bhagavā avoca. tatthetaṃ iti vuccati --
[21] ``caraṃ ^a^V0.0083^ea^ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ.
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0274^ea^ ca caraṃ vā tiṭṭhaṃ vā {yo caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ (syā0), yo caraṃ vātha tiṭṭhaṃ vā (sī0 ka0)}, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ.
[22] bhabbo so tādiso bhikkhu, phuṭṭhuṃ sambodhimuttama''nti..
[03] ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti. ekādasamaṃ.
[03] ``sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharatha {hotha (syā0)} sampannapātimokkhā; pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino; samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesu.

[03] ``sampannasīlānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, viharataṃ {bhavataṃ (syā0)} sampannapātimokkhānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutānaṃ viharataṃ ācāragocarasampannānaṃ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīnaṃ samādāya sikkhataṃ sikkhāpadesu kimassa uttari karaṇīyaṃ {kimassa bhikkhave uttari karaṇīyaṃ (sabbattha)}?

[03] ``carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno {abhijjhā byāpādo vigato (a0 ni0 4.12) aṭṭhakathāya sameti} bhijjhā vigatā {abhijjhā byāpādo vigato (a0 ni0 4.12) aṭakathāya sameti} hoti, byāpādo vigato hoti {thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchā (a0 ni0 4.12)}, thinamiddhaṃ vigataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ ^a^P0.0119^ea^ vigataṃ hoti, vicikicchā {thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikiccā (a0 ni0 4.12)} pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṃ hoti vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā {appamuṭṭhā (syā0)}, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ^a^T0.0320^ea^. carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.

[03] ``ṭhitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno abhijjhā vigatā hoti byāpādo...pe0... thinamiddhaṃ... uddhaccakukkuccaṃ... vicikicchā pahīnā hoti, āraddhaṃ hoti ^a^M0.0275^ea^ vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ ^a^V0.0084^ea^, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ. ṭhitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃbhūto ātāpī ottāpī satataṃ samitaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
